data.title: Not Your Mother's
data.meta_description: It's a state of mind! — We celebrate our differences and create high quality,  salon-inspired, clean haircare products for all generations.  We’re bold, different and always evolving. We reimagine your haircare products, building in benefits you didn’t know were possible.
